column1: # Partition table for HackOS – ESP32 4 MB Flash
# @brief Custom partition layout enabling dual-OTA updates.
# Flash chip: 4 MB (0x400000).  The first 36 KB (0x0000–0x8FFF) is reserved
# for the ESP32 second-stage bootloader and partition-table sectors; the
# entries below cover the remaining addressable space.
#   - app0     : 1.5 MB  – OTA slot A (active firmware)
#   - app1     : 1.5 MB  – OTA slot B (pending firmware)
#   - spiffs   : 960 KB  – LittleFS/SPIFFS user data (data/ directory)
